pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multilevel Latent Time Series Models with 'R' and 'Stan' // Fit multilevel manifest or latent time-series models, including popular Dynamic Structural Equation Models (DSEM). The models can be set up and modified with user-friendly functions and are fit to the data using 'Stan' for Bayesian inference. Path models and formulas for user-defined models can be easily created with functions using 'knitr'. Asparouhov, Hamaker, Muthen (2018) doi:10.1080/10705511.2017.1406803.
